did.unittitle: Office of Communications and Marketing Records1981-2005

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Office of Communications and Marketing (University at Albany)

did.abstract: The Office of Communications and Marketing Records contain video footage of winter and spring commencement ceremonies at the University at Albany between 1981-2005.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this record group is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives received these videos from the Office of Communications and Marketing.

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: Founded in 1844 as the New York State Normal School, the University at Albany held its first commencement ceremony in 1845. The first graduating class of the Normal School consisted of 34 graduates; 29 men and 5 women. Currently the University at Albany holds two commencements during the year, one in May and the other in the December, with more than 3,000 students receiving degrees annually.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: While the Office of Communications and Marketing annually films many other campus events, the commencement videos are the first to be included in this finding aid. Therefore the records primarily include VHS, Mini-DV and DVD footage of May undergraduate and graduate commencement ceremonies and a smaller amount of footage from the joint winter commencement in December. Frequently there are multiple videos for the same ceremony, including footage taken from different angles. Some videos feature departmental commencements or other annual events, such as “Torch Night,” which is held the day before graduation and inducts graduates into the Alumni Association.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is organized chronologically. There are no series.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Office of Communications and Marketing Records, 1981-2005. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York.
